description: Contains incoming sensor data directly from monitoring stations in the Poudre Water Quality Network. This is the entry point for all raw data from external APIs before any processing or quality control.
purpose: Store unprocessed, original sensor measurements and related metadata from HydroVu API and mWater field notes
data_sources: HydroVu API - water quality sensor measurements
mWater API - field technician notes and maintenance records

subfolders.name: HydroVu
subfolders.description: Primary container for HydroVu sensor data and related files

retention_policy.description: Raw data moved to archive after processing, archived indefinitely for audit purposes

quality_control.validation: basic format and API response validation only
